name: Sales Order by Delivery Date
query:
SELECT
  so.company,
  so.customer,
  so.name AS sales_order,
  soi.item_code,
  soi.item_group,
  soi.qty AS old_qty,
  soi.rate AS old_rate,
  soi.amount AS old_amount,
  soi.delivery_date AS old_delivery_date,
  so.status,
  soi.name,
  sois.item_id,
  COALESCE(sois.delivery_date, soi.delivery_date) AS delivery_date,
 COALESCE( sois.quantity,soi.qty) AS qty,
 COALESCE( sois.item_rate,soi.rate) AS rate,
 COALESCE( sois.quantity,soi.qty)* COALESCE( sois.item_rate,soi.rate) as amount

FROM `tabSales Order Item` soi
  INNER JOIN `tabSales Order` so
    ON so.name = soi.parent
    AND soi.parent = so.name
  LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSales Order Item Split` sois
    ON soi.name = sois.item_id
WHERE so.status NOT IN ('Stopped', 'Closed', 'On Hold')
AND so.docstatus = 1
AND COALESCE(sois.delivery_date, soi.delivery_date) BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
ORDER BY so.customer,so.name, soi.item_code
